meanings.definition: Limeys (noun): A slang term for British people.
meanings.sent1: The limeys were excited to visit the famous landmarks in London.
meanings.sent2: I met some limeys at the pub last night.
meanings.sent3: The limeys were puzzled by the American slang they heard.
meanings.sent4: The limeys' accents were like music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The limeys' love for tea is well-known around the world.

meanings.definition: Limeys (adjective): Relating to or characteristic of British people.
meanings.sent1: She wore a limeys hat to show her British pride.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served traditional limeys dishes.
meanings.sent3: The limeys sense of humor always brightens my day.
meanings.sent4: The limeys weather made me feel right at home.
meanings.sent5: His limeys accent was charming and easy to listen to.
